TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit EnumerableRowCollectionExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class EnumerableRowCollectionExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: 包含数据行集合类的扩展方法。

span.span: Contains the extension methods for the data row collection classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含 为和类定义方法和标准查询操作的静态扩展方法 。The class contains static extension methods that define the method and standard query operations for the and classes. 此类不能被继承，因此不能被实例化。This class cannot be inherited and cannot be instantiated.

span.span: Standard Query Operators Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是使用延迟执行实现的。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时返回值是一个对象，该对象存储执行操作所需的所有信息。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 此方法表示的查询在枚举对象之前不会执行，方法是直接调用其 `GetEnumerator` 方法，或者通过 `foreach` 在 Visual c # 中使用或 `For Each` 在 Visual Basic 中使用。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 序列中的元素不能强制转换为 类型。

span.span: An element in the sequence cannot be cast to type .
Sorts the rows of a in ascending order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是使用延迟执行实现的。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时返回值是一个对象，该对象存储执行操作所需的所有信息。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 此方法表示的查询在枚举对象之前不会执行，方法是直接调用其 `GetEnumerator` 方法，或者通过 `foreach` 在 Visual c # 中使用或 `For Each` 在 Visual Basic 中使用。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic. 此投影方法要求转换函数 `selector` 为源序列中的每个值生成一个值 `source` 。This projection method requires the transform function, `selector`, to produce one value for each value in the source sequence, `source`. 如果 `selector` 返回本身为集合的值，则由使用者手动遍历个子序列。If `selector` returns a value that is itself a collection, it is up to the consumer to traverse the subsequences manually.

summary.span: 按升序对 的行进行次要排序。

span.span: Performs a secondary ordering of the rows of a in ascending order.

param.name: source
param.span: 包含要筛选的 元素的 。

span.span: An containing the elements to filter.

param.name: predicate
param.span: 用于测试每个元素是否满足条件的函数。

span.span: A function to test each element for a condition.

summary.span: 按指定谓词筛选行序列。

span.span: Filters a sequence of rows based on the specified predicate.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含输入序列中满足该条件的行。

span.span: An that contains rows from the input sequence that satisfy the condition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是使用延迟执行实现的。This method is implemented by using deferred execution. 即时返回值是一个对象，该对象存储执行操作所需的所有信息。The immediate return value is an object that stores all the information that is required to perform the action. 此方法表示的查询在枚举对象之前不会执行，方法是直接调用其 `GetEnumerator` 方法，或者通过 `foreach` 在 Visual c # 中使用或 `For Each` 在 Visual Basic 中使用。The query represented by this method is not executed until the object is enumerated either by calling its `GetEnumerator` method directly or by using `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic.
